summary.name: bioconductor-rgsepd
summary.description: R/GSEPD is a bioinformatics package for R to help disambiguate transcriptomesamples (a matrix of RNA-Seq counts at RefSeq IDs) by automating differentialexpression (with DESeq2), then gene set enrichment (with GOSeq), and finallya N-dimensional projection to quantify in which ways each sample is like eithertreatment group.
